data Config = Config {
  • continue_on_unknown_instruction :: Bool
  • generate_pdfs :: Bool
  • verbose_logs :: Bool
  • store_preconditions_in_L0 :: Bool
  • store_assertions_in_L0 :: Bool
  • max_time :: Natural
  • max_num_of_cases :: Natural
  • max_num_of_bases :: Natural
  • max_num_of_sources :: Natural
  • max_jump_table_size :: Natural
  • max_expr_size :: Natural
}
name: Config Config max_expr_size max_jump_table_size max_num_of_sources max_num_of_bases max_num_of_cases max_time store_assertions_in_L0 store_preconditions_in_L0 verbose_logs generate_pdfs continue_on_unknown_instruction

data GenericAddress storage
  • = AddressStorage storage
  • | AddressImm Word64
  • | AddressMinus (GenericAddress storage) (GenericAddress storage)
  • | AddressPlus (GenericAddress storage) (GenericAddress storage)
  • | AddressTimes (GenericAddress storage) (GenericAddress storage)
name: GenericAddress AddressStorage AddressImm AddressMinus AddressPlus AddressTimes

display_html:
data SectionsInfo = SectionsInfo {
  • si_sections :: [(String, String, Word64, Word64)]
  • si_min_address :: Word64
  • si_max_address :: Word64
}
name: SectionsInfo SectionsInfo si_max_address si_min_address si_sections

display_html:
data Symbol
  • = Relocated_Function String
  • | Relocated_Label String
  • | Internal_Label String
name: Symbol Internal_Label Relocated_Label Relocated_Function

display_html:
class BinaryClass a where
  • binary_read_ro_data :: a -> Word64 -> Int -> Maybe [Word8]
  • binary_read_data :: a -> Word64 -> Int -> Maybe [Word8]
  • binary_get_sections_info :: a -> SectionsInfo
  • binary_get_symbols :: a -> SymbolTable
  • binary_get_relocations :: a -> Set Relocation
  • binary_pp :: a -> String
  • binary_entry :: a -> Word64
  • binary_text_section_size :: a -> Int
name: BinaryClass binary_text_section_size binary_entry binary_pp binary_get_relocations binary_get_symbols binary_get_sections_info binary_read_data binary_read_ro_data

display_html: data Binary = forall b.BinaryClass b => Binary b
name: Binary Binary

class HasSize a where
  • sizeof :: a -> Int
name: HasSize sizeof

display_html:
data GenericOperand storage
  • = Memory (GenericAddress storage) Int
  • | EffectiveAddress (GenericAddress storage)
  • | Storage storage
  • | Immediate Word64
name: GenericOperand Memory EffectiveAddress Storage Immediate

display_html:
data GenericInstruction label storage prefix opcode annotation = Instruction {
  • label :: label
  • prefix :: Maybe prefix
  • opcode :: opcode
  • dest :: Maybe (GenericOperand storage)
  • srcs :: [GenericOperand storage]
  • annot :: Maybe annotation
}
name: GenericInstruction Instruction label prefix opcode dest srcs annot
